name.text: 10.1.2.13 Dividing one complex number by another

questiontext.text:
Example

Find \(\displaystyle{{{z\over w}}}\) if \(z=2-3i\) and \(w=2+i\).

Solution

\[\begin{aligned} {z\over w}={2-3i\over {2+i}} &={(2-3i)\times (2-i)\over {(2+i)\times (2-i)}}\qquad \text{rationalising}\\&={4-3+i(-6-2)\over {4+1}}\qquad \text{multiplying out}\qquad\qquad\qquad\qquad\qquad\qquad\\ &={1\over 5}-{8\over 5}i\qquad \text{dividing through}\end{aligned}\]
